script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As a security officer I want the platform to be able to revoke the public key for a device

Happy flow:


Scenario: successfully revoke a key for existing device

scenario success input values device
given a revoke key request with @device
and the revoke key request refers to an existing device @device
and the revoke key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the revoke key request is received on OSGP
then the device's key should be cleared
and the revoke key request should return a revoke key response

success input values
device
DVC-01
scenario success input values device
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a revoke key request with DVC-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request refers to an existing device DVC-01
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the revoke key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device's key should be cleared
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request should return a revoke key response

Alternative flow(s):

- N/A

Exception flow(s):


Scenario: revoke key request for non-existing device

scenario error input values device
given a revoke key request with @device
and the revoke key request refers to a non-existing device @device
and the revoke key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the revoke key request is received on OSGP
then no device should be created
and the revoke key request should return an error message

error input values
device
DVC-02
scenario error input values device
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a revoke key request with DVC-02
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request refers to a non-existing device DVC-02
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the revoke key request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist no device should be created
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the revoke key request should return an error message
